definition: to work hard for/to do all one can/to contend strongly
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
to strive for mastery (idiom); aiming for the best result/to have high ambitions

sentences.english: Journalists in the United States strive to achieve objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，新聞工作者力爭做到客觀。

sentences.english: Marlowe struggled with a niggling respect for the man, despite his sore jaw.
sentences.chinese: 瑪露力爭維護那男人的尊嚴，不管她父親的那種教訓。

sentences.english: And Coca-Cola managed to make itself one of the most widely distributed products of wartime.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂更力爭上游，成爲戰時最暢銷產品之一。

sentences.english: Zoe is furious that her father won't fight for her to stay.
sentences.chinese: 祖伊對父親並未極力爭取將她留在身邊一事深感憤怒。

sentences.english: If accompanied with hepatic metastases, the primary tumor and hepatic metastases tumors should be resected simultaneously with efforts.
sentences.chinese: 對於有肝轉移者應力爭同時切除原發竈和轉移竈。

sentences.english: Zhu said, as he headed for an electronics factory, where he would inquire about profitability.
sentences.chinese: 朱先生曾經領導過一家電子廠，在利益率上力爭上游。

sentences.english: To strive to be a pace-setter.
sentences.chinese: 一個好學生要有力爭上游的決心。

sentences.english: The off-season too much of life, should strive to harvest.
sentences.chinese: 人生的淡季太多了，收穫的時候就該力爭。

sentences.english: Said Li Xiang, as do, will strive to perfect.
sentences.chinese: 李想說，既然做了，就要力爭完美。

sentences.english: So why am I working hard in order to get that BCG job?
sentences.chinese: 我爲什麼還要努力爭取好工作？

sentences.english: That is the ideal we strive for in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們在美國力爭實現的理想狀況。

sentences.english: North View Primary School strives to be the Centre of Excellence for Guzheng in the North Zone.
sentences.chinese: 德賢小學力爭成爲北區古箏卓越中心。

sentences.english: We must improve in every area.
sentences.chinese: 我們應在各個領域力爭上游。

sentences.english: One part invested by the client mixed with ten parts hard work from us achieves 100percent satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 客戶一分投入，我們十分努力，力爭百分效果。

sentences.english: So, that's what we are trying to do.
sentences.chinese: 所以那是我們正努力爭取做到的。
